comments:
After installing the CodeRally plugin and finishing some other projects, I 
deleted all the projects and the CodeRally plugin directly from the Windows 
file manager(not from the Eclipse navigator). After that, Eclipse could no 
longer start up. And it popped out a message dialog saying: "Problem during 
startup. Check the ".log" file in the ".metadata" directory of your workspace."

And this is what the log file looks like:
!SESSION ----------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are using any build post M5 you will also have to delete your
eclipse/.config directory.  There is a problem with the plugin registry being
cached and not handling removal of plugins properly.  This is described in Bug
48839.  Please try deleting this directory and restart eclipse.  If the problem
persists then I will reopen the bug.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 48839 ***
